snippet: Jeffrey E. Thompson admitted that he and his companies gave more than $3.3 million in illegal contributions to at least 28 candidates, including to Mayor Vincent C. Gray of Washington.
abstract: Jeffrey E Thompson, wealthy Washington, DC, businessman, pleads guilty to two conspiracy charges, admitting to funneling more than $3.3 million in illegal campaign contributions to at least 28 local and federal candidates between 2006 and 2012; plea brings renewed attention to 2010 election of district of Columbia Mayor Vincent C Gray.
lead_paragraph: Jeffrey E. Thompson admitted that he and his companies gave more than $3.3 million in illegal contributions to at least 28 candidates, including to Mayor Vincent C. Gray of Washington.

headline.main: Washington Businessman Pleads Guilty Over Illegal Contributions
headline.print_headline: Washington Mayor Is Cited in Donor’s Conspiracy Plea
